Html:
Hi,
I'm using the Excel 2007 classes for mail bursting simple excel tabular reports, and it works great!
With the help of the examples it was very simple to put this into production. Having this versatile tool I'm now thinking of massproducing pivot tables.
The problem for me is I'm a total Excel ignorant. Before I start to dig into this myself, I would appreciate if someone can tell if it is possible to produce 'Excel pivot tables' with this softeware and publish a simple example how to do pivot tables.

It is possible with SpreadsheetML, but not implemented in PHPExcel.

I'll mark this as a feature request, and digg into it. If it's possible withing the PHPExcel architecture, you'll see it in the releases.
